required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Effect of Cemented Implantation in Shoulder Replacement on Blood Pressure
clinical_study.official_title: A Multi-center Study on Effect of Cemented Implantation in Shoulder Replacement on Blood Pressure

collaborator.agency: First Affiliated Hospital of Harbin Medical University

brief_summary.textblock: To clarify the downward trend of blood pressure affected by bone cement implantation during shoulder replacement operations.

detailed_description.textblock: A total of 350 cases of proximal humeral fracture are planned to be recruited and receive semi-shoulder replacement in Department of Orthopedics and Trauma，Peking University People's Hospital．The blood pressure data are collected from patients' anesthesia records. Both the systolic and diastolic blood pressure are recorded at four time spots during operation: the time before using of bone cement (time period A), 0-5 min after using cement (time period B), 5-10 min after using cement (time period C) and 10-15min after using cement (time period D). The data of blood pressure are collected according to anesthesia records．

primary_outcome.measure: Change from Baseline Systolic Blood Pressure
primary_outcome.time_frame: Change from Baseline Systolic Blood Pressure at 15 mins
primary_outcome.description: the systolic blood pressure after insert the cemented stem

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from Baseline Diastolic Blood Pressure
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Change from Baseline Diastolic Blood Pressure at 15 mins
secondary_outcome.description: the diastolic blood pressure after insert the cemented stem

arm_group.description: A total of 350 cases of proximal humeral fracture receiving cemented shoulder replacement in Department of Orthopedics and Trauma

intervention.description: proximal humeral fracture receiving hemi-shoulder replacement with cement when inserting the stem

study_pop.textblock: patients with three or four part of proximal humeral fracture, receive shoulder replacement

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
•patients with three or four part of proximal humeral fracture receiving cemented shoulder replacement
Exclusion Criteria:
- pathologic fracture
- severe hypertension or hypotension
